website_summaries.verdict: Extremely strong yet lightweight casting rod offers top-of-the-line performance and sensitivity.
pros: Two-piece design makes it easier to travel with
Reel seat and 6+1 guides resist corrosion
Good price point for the high level of performance
cons: Rod may break when hooking larger fish
The 2 pieces may not fit together properly without sanding

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but....
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these rods. One broke with a 3lb bass on the line. Will change review after I talk with customer service. I've owned the rods for 3 days. *Update 5/30/17* Customer service is superb. I have had no issues with the other rod. It's possible the one that broke may have had a hair line fracture from shipping or something. I caught a much larger fish on the other and had no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Painter

customer_reviews.title: A good value for a light rod
customer_reviews.text: The rod broke about 5" from the top on the first flex while feeding line through the guides. Did not get a chance for first cast. UPDATE: Customer service at Entsport said they were willing to replace the rod eventhough it was outside Amazon's return window. Changing review to reflect great customer service :) UPDATE: Rod arrived and I got a chance to use it. The rod is light duty and easily handles lures up to 1/2 oz. Most of mine are 1/4 oz and worked very well with the rod. For the price, this is a great value. Customer service is unmatched.
customer_reviews.author: Moke

customer_reviews.title: Better Than The Son Than The Father!
customer_reviews.text: It was a very beautiful fishing pole. It was a Christmas gift for my 42 year old nephew who was acting worse than any child. In fact I would rather have given it to his 9 year old son. His son volunteered to go fishing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Serrato

customer_reviews.title: Quality Customer Service, Rod has a custom feel.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rod and upon arrival I noticed that one of the line guides was off center. I contacted the company to inform them of the problem. Juli ,has been more than helpful, and Entsport is shipping a replacement to correct the issue, no questions asked. I will buy from them again, due to their commitment for quality customer service, and quality of their product, and the company willing to stand behind their product. Something very ,very, rare these days. The rod is beautiful, well balanced and has exceptional feel, to even the slightest "tick" of crappie bites. I ordered the Medium Heavy and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH C.

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking ride with nice action but fell apart almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't used this fishing rod that much although I like the action of it.... Really good for mangrove snapper... Unfortunately the rings popped out of the eyelets the first time I used it. I've super glued them back in a couple times but I wouldn't recommend buying this rod.
customer_reviews.author: william j bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Great cranking/swimbait rod!
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for cranking or using lighter swimbaits. A lot of nice bend in the tip and good backbone for setting the hook. I tend to set the hook really hard and had no worries about the rod breaking. Excellent rod for the budget tournament fisherman!
customer_reviews.author: Kyler - Fishing After 5

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this rod to anyone looking for a collapsible rod
customer_reviews.text: I took a trip a backcountry canoeing trip with this rod and it really exceeded my expectations. I have several high end, one piece rods so I wasn't expecting much from a two piece but I was very impressed with this one. Especially for the price you pay, this one is well worth the money. The reel seat is metal and is strong and the rod is both sensitive and light. I would highly recommend this rod to anyone looking for a collapsible rod. I actually broke the rod on the trip and the company offered to replace it for free even though it was no fault of their own.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not a ‘2-piece’ pole; 1 pole snapped in 2 pieces
customer_reviews.text: I received what appears to be a regular pole snapped in half. The break was not clean. There is no way to affix both halves together. Additionally the bag the pole came in has a big hole at the bottom. I would be angry if this wasnt so funny. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: ROD SNAPPED WHILE FISHING
customer_reviews.text: Rod packaged was decent. Rod was wrapped in paper to prevent bouncing around. Rod was delivered in two pieces in a bag. Rod appears solid and functions so far. Did a few practice cast with no issues so far. Will update once on the water and ran it trough a few more cast and see how well it holds up against fish. So far happy with my purchase. 29JUL20 UPDATE: 2nd time out in water, hooked first fish using a 1/6 oz ned with this rod and front end of the rod snapped into two pieces. Fish was about 1-2lb bass. Took a chance as the rod looks good but did not hold up. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Al B

customer_reviews.title: A good travel rod.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium action rod that I wanted to keep in the car with a small box of tackle for those ponds and small lakes that I may come across. I've used the rod 6x now and am very pleased with the action. my only complaint is one of the guides is slightly out of line. It does not affect the function or performance in any way but I notice it every time I put the rod together. Otherwise, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Kingfish

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I own an Entsport combo and have enjoyed both thoroughly, so I purchased this rod as a gift for a friend, along with the Entsport baitcaster reel. He is a first time bait casting fisherman, but the rod and reel are performing extremely well, despite his frequent backlashes. The price and performance of the product make it a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sapper_6

customer_reviews.title: Rod won't seat
customer_reviews.text: When putting the rod together the two pieces don't fit very well. The male end is too large. I got them partially together and it is so tight I am unable to pull it apart. So much for having a 2 piece rod.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is great
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this I will buy another
customer_reviews.author: charles haley

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I matched the rod with an Abu Garcia reel and it was a great combo. I fished it for about 4 months and the other day the rod snapped while on the water. I have no clue why, but it snapped clean like someone literally chopped it with a saw. It took multiple 3-5 pound fish with ease until this happened and that's why I give it 4 stars. I knew before I bought it that others were having a problem similar to this, but I was just hoping I would get off lucky. If I knew it wouldn't happen again, I would totally buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great action...great look
customer_reviews.text: this is not a brand I’m familiar with but it looked good and I needed a 2 piece for traveling. I really do like this rid. It has a great action and good feel. It looks like a super expensive rod for a fraction of the price. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: S Force

customer_reviews.title: I'm not going to buy another one of the poles
customer_reviews.text: Nice-looking pole fuel finishing your hands the only downside is where I was using it I had approximately maybe a 10 pound fishing line and it's snapped down toward the middle I would not recommend buying this if you going to go anything after anything thatis a little more robust
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: light and great for light tackle fishing
customer_reviews.text: 5 out of 5 for customer service! Fist of all let me start by saying the rod is well constructed, light and great for light tackle fishing. The rod unfortunately broke after fighting a fish.. bummer right? No way! Entsport made it right and after a quick email a new rod was on the way. I couldn't be happier with the service or the product. There are not many companies out there today that put customers first but this is one. Give their product a try you wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Michael quacinella

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this Rod
customer_reviews.text: Rod arrived in perfect condition...took it out this last week paired with my Abu Garcia 6500 ......a perfect combination. Rod is high quality and beautiful to boot. Update: Have taken this out several times now.....you know that almost giddy feeling you get when you realize that you just got an outstanding product and an outstanding price? Well I got it with this rod. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Walter Harris

customer_reviews.title: looks good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used the rod as soon as I got it, it is fast action, very light, looks good for the price, but as i had a Bass, the rod snapped. I messaged the seller and promised to send a new rod. Next day, Customer service is awesome, apologized for the rod and going to send a new rod and offered discounts at there store. The service and price make up for the inconvenience of a bad rod.
customer_reviews.author: Lion-o

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rod
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I wanted. Very pleased. My only issue is the reel foot was a little oversized for my reel, but I cured it with a few pieces of duct tape around each foot.
customer_reviews.author: buzah

customer_reviews.title: Nice pole, pretty pole, sturdy pole
customer_reviews.text: Great pole. Have used it about 10 times so far and it hasn’t let me down yet with a 4 lb largemouth bass with a good 2-3 pounds of hydrilla with it and no problems. The only “weird” thing about it is the design.. it kind of looks like little fake diamonds on the handle part. which really pops out but it’s just a shiny design. The only reason I mention is because another fisherman said “wow, cool bling” and I immediately knew what he meant. My wife even said it must be for her when it arrived but haters gonna hate. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J Y

customer_reviews.title: Weak rod, broke in third trip out with it.
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the third use while setting the hook on a fish. Will stick to a brand name to replace it. Customer Service is sending new rod, so five stars for the service. Will update when I get to use the new rod. Hopefully, it lasts longer than the first.
customer_reviews.author: Zirjacks

customer_reviews.title: Awe rod great price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rod. Paired with an abu Garcia blue max . I own 2 rods now from this company and both are great rods.
customer_reviews.author: fatboy513

customer_reviews.title: Good looking rod! Fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking rod! Color choices are great! Customer service is top notch. Amazon sent me the wrong power. Wanted medium heavy but received medium light. I contacted Sportmall and they sent me two tips for the mistake. Much Appreciated! They looking after their customers!
customer_reviews.author: ss612

customer_reviews.title: top eye insert came out so it just shreds line was a good rod but broke after less than 1 season' update ...
customer_reviews.text: came broken but replaced quickly with new rod thanks entsport Edit: rod handled 24+ inch striped bass with no signs of giving and I believe it can handle bigger as long as your drag is set right but the reel seat comes loose once or twice per trip so 4 stars over all worth it especially for $40. update 2: top eye insert came out so it just shreds line was a good rod but broke after less than 1 season' update 3: customer service is back for more
customer_reviews.author: kevin dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this rod on 2 trips and landed an 8lbs bass on it and it performed very well. Great rod for the price. I marcher it with a last king royal legend reel. So far it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, great quality, happy grandson
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this pole for our 11-year-old grandson who wanted it for his new bait caster. He was so excited to try it out. He caught several large bass with the pole and has no issues with it. He has it several times in the past month, since receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Shanlynn

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Was really surprised by the quality and eye catching style of this rod. A really good value. Need a good rod at a good price, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A.

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: This item is well made but I had to sand the male portion of the joint to get it to slide together completely.
customer_reviews.author: mkb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price will not let you down.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rod. Fought many big bass and heldbup great with great rigidity and fight power. Was skeptical because it wasn't a brand I knew but far surpassed my ecpectations. Also has held up to many long nose gar.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from me!
customer_reviews.text: This rod is very light yet very strong, it's a little different than any other rod I've used but hey different can be good! Thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Rlgepy5

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, dependable rod!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rod to go on a fishing trip with my daughters. I was very pleased, and was able to land some very nice trout with this rod. I love the length, and was able to get very nice casts out of this rod. If you are looking for a nice rod, with a decent price, I would suggest you give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fishing Rod
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Entsport graphite fishing rod. I have used it successfully catching some 1- 2 pound white bass. It is extremely sensitive to bass strikes which makes it easier to set my hook. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Steen

customer_reviews.title: Don't pass it up
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how they can produce a quality rod like this for the money they charge, The workmanship is perfect. GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: old hunter

customer_reviews.title: Best pole for bottom dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Great pole, great response and flexibility. Caught bass bigger than what is rated with no problems. Does not come apart when casting (being a 2 piece). Casts very far and is very light. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, besutiful color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the light weight feel of the rod! It came in a little stick jacket type setup that is great until I get some more. Excited to use come bass season!
customer_reviews.author: Leah L'Rae

customer_reviews.title: Good fishing rod.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I have used the rod to fish for bass in fresh water and trout and/or redfish in salt water. The rod has performed as hoped. Would purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy the product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy the product. This is a beautiful rod with an amazing feel! It will certainly exceed expetation for a rod in this price range!
customer_reviews.author: Ross and Jeana Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Came late and broken. No damage to box.
customer_reviews.text: It came a day later then it was supposed to. It came in an absurdly large box. The pole was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Shaggie Dave

customer_reviews.title: but I really like the action at the tip
customer_reviews.text: This is about a foot longer than I am used to, but I really like the action at the tip, and I use it almost every day before work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rod
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rod. I caught a 6lb + carp and was thrilled with this rod action.
customer_reviews.author: Budman.

customer_reviews.title: Versitility is the name of the game
customer_reviews.text: This casting rod worked great for my medium sized crank baits and spinner baits. The "medium heavy" has enough backbone for a nice hook set while still maintaining flexibility for those long casts. Not a stiff worming rod by any means, the Entsport medium heavy 2-piece casting rod is a great "all 'rounder." For the money, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shimbabwe

customer_reviews.title: Bad eyelets
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived with the majority of the eyelets bent towards the rod tip. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Good action.
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I thought itd be. Good action. Caught alot of bass on this rod paired with my staco baitcaster reel.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not a nice rod
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best but good enough for my needs. Update, the tip broke while fishing. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph A. Philpott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baitcaster rod
customer_reviews.text: Excellent baitcaster rod. Cannot go wrong at this price.I own the same rod in the spin model and am very happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: waratahpastoralco

customer_reviews.title: Both Rods that I purchased broke in the same spot ...
customer_reviews.text: Both Rods that I purchased broke in the same spot right behind the 3 eyelet on our 3rd fishing trip. Durability seems to be an issue. Will not be purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Team Dunnan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rod!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first casting rod other than Abu Garcia and it works great. It is really nice to be able to use this 2 piece rod when I don't want to take the boat out! It's in my any small car and comes with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Rene V. Sotomayor

customer_reviews.title: very good rod but i bought the medium heavy
customer_reviews.text: very good rod but i bought the medium heavy, its more like a medium. a little to much spring for a bait cast reel, i will use it for my spinning reel. great customer service though.
customer_reviews.author: plumbum1

customer_reviews.title: Pole looks great when first opened
customer_reviews.text: Pole looks great when first opened. Feels really good in the hand and you can tell it's made from some quality materials, especially with all of the metal pieces on the handle. No corrosion in saltwater conditions even so far. Would recommend and will be buying from them again soon. Great customer service from the company as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: One happy boy here now.
customer_reviews.text: It made my son very happy to have this rod in his collection for fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Medium heavy pole is a glorified ultralight
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. Pole is described as a medium heavy but is half the thickness of my other medium poles and bends about as much as an ultralight. I bough this to be a jig pole but won’t even bother stringing it up, it’s going right back in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great poles , fishs great. Very strong!! Must buy!! The company is wonderful and so it there customer service. They have gone above and beyond plus there products are great and I will continue to buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Ezee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought three rods 2 casting and 1 spinning so I could have all my rods match. These rods did not disappoint I’ve used them probably about 8 times now and all around they are great. They are sensitive and have a nice backbone to set the hook. I would definitely buy more of these if I ever bought more reels.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Baker

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first fish hooked!
customer_reviews.text: The pole broke on the first fish I hooked on it! Piece of junk and don't recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: VEB

customer_reviews.title: Great casting rod
customer_reviews.text: This pole works great and matches my Piscifun Perseus well. It is a really good pole for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Petkus

customer_reviews.title: Good rod for the money
customer_reviews.text: The two sections do not fit completely together like other 2 piece rods I have owned, there is a slight curve toward the end of the rod near the tip. It is light weight, fished with it one day so far. Would totally buy another one for the money
customer_reviews.author: M. Pettit

customer_reviews.title: snapped under 15LB of pressure
customer_reviews.text: great price looks great too but if you get snagged or catch a fish that fights hard it might snap under around 15 pounds of pressure not sure if it was my model or if this goes for all but okay product overall
customer_reviews.author: max newman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Looks and feels great. I love the actually sensitivity of this rod. I can feel a spinner bait easily, I can also control a light jog with ease. I recommend this pole to anyone looking for a good price quality Rod.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing pole
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these rods and my son has one some of the best built fishing poles for the money I absolutely love them I will definitely buy more I am pleased that I will be using these in the Bass Masters regionals on Lake Erie
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality rod
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this casting rod. I have used this rod for both bass and Northern Pike fishing. Great action and comfortable to use. I love the handle grip.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Broke after I was Done feeding the line up through the eyes my guess is that it broke in shipping or something Update: after posting my review the seller contacted me immediately and corrected the issue and sent me a new one customer service is like nothing I’ve ever had before hopefully this new one will work great, really looking forward to really putting it to the test
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stevens

customer_reviews.title: I have been very satisfied with this rod since i purchased it about 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with this rod since i purchased it about 5 months ago. it has good response and action; the tip sensitivity is excellent when fishing weightless soft plastics considering its a md/heavy and is obviously well suited for deep cranks or pitching into pads or grass. Haven't caught any records, but its handled a couple 4-5 pounders very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but that's it, Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The rod looks very nice but that's it. I inspected the rod and there were no visible cracks on the rod. So i added a 1/4oz weight to test it out, on about the 10th cast the rod breaks. I do not recommend this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure before purchasing the product if it was worth it, after receiving the fishing pole already damaged in the mail, the Support team reached out to me and helped and they were overall wonderful and some of the best customer service.
customer_reviews.author: FISH_BON3

customer_reviews.title: A good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and just as described. Excellent response when hooked with a fish. Unfortunately , have not caught a fish a bragging size fish(yet).
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: great product fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: great product fast shipping. the only problem is that the temp. outside is in the teens with ice and snow. i had to put it in a place that was out of my sight,so that i wouldn't feel bad.
customer_reviews.author: todd goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking fishing rod.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking casting rod. Very light medium action. Bought it because it was a 2 pc rod. Easy to transport. I have not used it yet. I will update later this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rod.
customer_reviews.text: The rod arrived as expected and was very handsome as was its accompanying bag. I caught a beautiful flounder with it the first time I used it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Zakrewsky

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a pole that I would use again
customer_reviews.text: You know the saying you get what you pay for won’t make that mistake again
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive rod and easy to cast!! Would recommend this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice rod, I have caught several nice trout on it in the lakes of Wyoming.
customer_reviews.author: WYCowboy65

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Fishing Rod
customer_reviews.text: This fishing rod comes with a nice case. It is well built and I look forward to using it with a new bait caster reel I purchased recently.
customer_reviews.author: Hoefts

customer_reviews.title: Decent rod for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The rod itself seems pretty good so far. Only issue I had is the but cap wasn’t attached very well and it came off. Simple fix with a little bit of glue.
customer_reviews.author: Mickman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Rod arrived on time, workmanship was nice. Rod was more light action rod. Could not use it sent it back. Gave it 4 stars for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: chicago lou

customer_reviews.title: it has good flex and strength
customer_reviews.text: This rod is being used to hunt bass...it has good flex and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Glen A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: entsport casting rod
customer_reviews.text: well made and fun to use light to medium weight casting rod. it flexed and bent a great deal with an 11" striped bass hooked
customer_reviews.author: Charles L.

customer_reviews.title: ... Rod was very stylish and sleek very flexible and easy to handle with great sensitivity recommend this with my ...
customer_reviews.text: This Rod was very stylish and sleek very flexible and easy to handle with great sensitivity recommend this with my baitcaster it matches up well great for bass fishing
customer_reviews.author: robert chatman

customer_reviews.title: The action is great and allows for precise casting to get into the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these rods for my baitcasters. The action is great and allows for precise casting to get into the tight spots. Also the colors matched my Kastking baitcasters perfectly. Great price and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made with a nice feel to it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made bait casting rod. I got it in medium wt for bass fishing. Very well made with a nice feel to it. I think I can get better and longer cast because of the way the butt stock is made. Bill
customer_reviews.author: Armp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I feel I made a good choice. Also amazed at costumer service. And how they stand by the product. In this day it is hard to find a company that will go the Extra mile. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: William Prescott

customer_reviews.title: The rod looks wonderful, especially with my new reel on it
customer_reviews.text: The rod looks wonderful, especially with my new reel on it. It feels very good in your hand when you're casting it. I think it is a great rod and it won't cost you an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Super Nice - well made and I feel the price makes it a super value. This is my second rod from this supplier - great service on top of a good value product. Can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gunworks

customer_reviews.title: Nice Casting Rod
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this rod. Very smooth casting. Great Customer Service, Quick to respond to any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Aimerbug

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ADDITION TO MY COLLECTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful , durable rod to add to my collection! This is the second one I've purchased and am sure to by more. Also, they have great customer service. Contacted them and had an immediate positive response!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel oneill

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the pole. Can't wait to take it fishing to try out. Price is definitely right.
customer_reviews.author: mike bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good rod but great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: Great action rod was a lil disappointed due to it breaking mid way of the rod while using for the second time however customer service was great no problems at all they said they will send another rod to replace the one that broke on me
customer_reviews.author: chad wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great rod, light weight 'perfect combo with the entsport ...
customer_reviews.text: Great rod , light weight 'perfect combo with the entsport 1knob reel.. affordable, well worth the price .really like the cloth for the easy put_away to keep it nice and clean
customer_reviews.author: oudone nalap

customer_reviews.title: The rod is great. Just moved to Orlando Fl
customer_reviews.text: The rod is great. Just moved to Orlando Fl, so had to adjust my fishing tackle to something lighter. This rods works great with my bait caster. Super light and strong. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stand behind their product
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite rods for about a year. I was heartbroken when it broke while landing a bass. Seller offered to replace the rod; top notch customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Giordano

customer_reviews.title: These rods are trash
customer_reviews.text: This is not a medium heavy rod I ordered.. this rod is too flimsy to hold any of my baits I tried to throw using the rod.. I’m highly upset about this one
customer_reviews.author: Marquis Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The rod came in good working condition and is an excellent value for the money! I plan to get another one.

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for a 12 year old grandson ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 12 year old grandson. He loves it. We bought the spinning rod also and he loves the way it handles

customer_reviews.title: This rod is excellent when paired with a nice bait caster
customer_reviews.text: This rod is excellent when paired with a nice bait caster. I dedicate this rod as my top water or jerk bait rod. Have pulled many fish out of the water with it. The seller is also great! Top notch customer service.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate buy now.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rod look forward to adding a few more to my arsenal.

customer_reviews.title: Best Rod out there
customer_reviews.text: Y I love the way this product cast and Millatti of it it is easy to just take apart and put it in my car I have caught some very large bass with this product

customer_reviews.title: Rod arrived promptly, worked well for a day, ...
customer_reviews.text: Rod arrived promptly, worked well for a day, but had a defect in one of the joints. Customer service promised to send a replacement pending review.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Blix

customer_reviews.title: What a very nice rod one of the best rods I have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: What a very nice rod one of the best rods I have ever purchase I a serieus fisherman year round one I wish it would come in a heavy plus model but nice, very good on square bill lure thanks guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rod broke first day of use
customer_reviews.text: Third fish my rod broke.... on a 2 lb catfish.... but they are in the process of sending me a new one and I do believe it was my individual rod not the rest
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Action
customer_reviews.text: The rod is nice, enjoy using it, It does seem a little lighter than the med/heavy rating but does have nice action.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

product_meta.title: Entsport E Series - Sirius Casting Rod 2-Piece 7-Feet Graphite Portable Baitcast Rod Inshore Baitcasting Fishing Rod Freshwater Baitcaster Rod
product_meta.description:
Entsport Story: 
My grandpa has been fishing more than 70 years. Fishing is a way of life. He had a rod in his hands almost since he could walk. In his early days, he had to find old broken tackle and tried to fix it up so that he could use it. Perhaps because of this history, he learned to love good fishing products. That has not changed over his life, my father’s life and mine. We love to fish, and we love good gear.
However, the most fishing rods in the market are not quality controlled and uniform from one item to the next. Only some big companies can provide great products, but too expensive. So we are determined to develop the unique and qualified fishing tackle at an affordable price.
Our Brand “Entsport” comes from our three beliefs about fishing: Enjoy, Neverending, Technology. So we divide our products into three series: 
E Series: High quality products that are affordable for any fisherman. 
N Series: Premium products represent that entsport's explore to quality will never end.
T Series: Super products focus on the technology and provide the best fishing experience! 

Entsport Service: 
Every product from Entsport has one year warranty. If there is any problem about the quality, please feel free to contact with us by email. We will give you a satisfied solution within 12 hours, as we always stand by our product and provide the best service. 

Specification:
Material: Carbon
Length: 7’
Pieces: 2
Guides: 6+1
Lure weight: 1/8-3/4oz
Line weight: 6-20lbs

The Package Includes:
1 x Fishing Rod
1 x Fishing Rod Protective Bag
feature_bullets: Built with high-tensile strength carbon blanks, increases strength while reducing weight
Enhanced reel seat with a screw down, cushioned, stainless steel hood keeps reel securely in place during long days on rough water
6+1 Stainless steel guides and inserts resist corrosion and transfer vibrations from the line to the rod and to your hand
Equipped with a multi-purpose hook holder, effective hook keeper
High density EVA handles reduce weight and increase comfort, gives greater sensitivity and durability
